mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Maurice, James
mdRecord.dcterms:description: If Jefferson has forwarded his effects to L'Orient, he wants Jefferson to know that Captain Calizt has just informed him that a merchant planned to check out Calitzt's ship to make sure it was suitable; if the merchant finds the ship to his liking, the ship may no longer be available for Jefferson to use; suggests that Jefferson wait to leave Paris until he has heard back from Maurice.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1789 September 09, L'Orient, [France], to Thomas Jefferson, Paris, [France].
